---
title: "Sources"
---

The events plotted come from Investopedia data.  
The graph was created using the "dpylr", "ggplot", and "quantmod" packages.

Quantmod: Pulled stock market data from a data set.  
GGPlot: Generated a viewable plot from the data.
ChatGPT: Helped transform quantmod data into the plot.

[Investopedia Event List](https://www.investopedia.com/timeline-of-stock-market-crashes-5217820#:~:text=Some%20of%20the%20most%20significant,following%20the%20outbreak%20of%20COVID.)
